skill.name: when-creating-presentations-use-pptx-generation
skill.description: Enterprise-grade PowerPoint deck generation using evidence-based prompting, workflow enforcement, constraint-based design
skill.summary: Generate professional PowerPoint presentations with WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility compliance, data visualizations, and consistent design systems
skill.author: DNYoussef

security_audit.summary: All 101 static findings are false positives from naive pattern matching. The scanner misidentified markdown code fences as Ruby backticks, keyword matches in documentation as weak cryptographic algorithms, and metadata fields as hidden file access. This is a legitimate presentation generation skill using pptxgenjs library with no malicious code or dangerous patterns.

content.value_statement: Create polished, accessible presentations with consistent branding, data visualizations, and WCAG 2.1 AA compliance. This skill automates slide generation for board decks, business reviews, and technical reports.
actual_capabilities: Generate PowerPoint presentations from structured content outlines
Apply consistent design systems with colors, fonts, and layouts
Create data visualizations including charts and tables
Add speaker notes and alt text for screen readers
Export accessibility reports with quality metrics
limitations: Complex animations and transitions not supported
Image placement limited to basic positioning

use_cases.title: Board Deck Creation
use_cases.description: Generate executive-level board presentations with consistent branding, data-driven insights, and professional formatting for board meetings.

use_cases.title: Quarterly Business Reviews
use_cases.description: Create data-rich quarterly reviews with charts, metrics, and trend analysis visualizations that communicate business performance clearly.

use_cases.title: Technical Documentation Slides
use_cases.description: Convert technical documentation into accessible slide decks with code examples, architecture diagrams, and accessibility compliance.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Presentation Request
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a PowerPoint presentation about {topic} with {slide_count} slides. Include an executive summary, key points, and a conclusion.
prompt_templates.scenario: Simple presentation creation for a single topic

prompt_templates.title: Data-Driven Report
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a presentation from the data in {data_file}. Create {n} slides with charts showing trends, a summary dashboard, and recommendations based on the analysis.
prompt_templates.scenario: Creating presentations from data files or datasets

prompt_templates.title: Board-Level Deck
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a professional board deck with {section_count} sections: agenda, executive summary, financial overview, strategic initiatives, risk assessment, and Q&A. Use corporate branding with WCAG 2.1 AA compliance.
prompt_templates.scenario: Creating formal board presentations with multiple sections

prompt_templates.title: Multi-Section Technical Report
prompt_templates.prompt: Transform the technical report at {doc_path} into a {slide_count}-slide presentation. Include title slide, agenda, executive summary, main sections with supporting data visualizations, conclusions, and speaker notes for each slide.
prompt_templates.scenario: Converting existing documents into structured presentations

output_examples.input: Create a 5-slide presentation about Q4 sales performance with charts showing revenue growth.
output: Slide 4: Revenue chart - Bar chart showing monthly revenue

output_examples.input: Build a board deck for annual strategy meeting with financial overview.
output: Slide 4: Financial Overview - 3 charts (revenue, profit, cash flow)
Slide 6: Risk Assessment - Matrix with 4 risks

best_practices: Provide clear content outlines with designated slide types before generation
Define design system early including colors, fonts, and layout constraints
Review accessibility report after generation to ensure WCAG compliance
Add speaker notes for complex slides to guide presentation delivery
anti_patterns: Requesting complex animations or embedded videos that exceed pptxgenjs capabilities
Skipping the design system phase results in inconsistent visual quality
Generating more than 40 slides reduces audience engagement
Ignoring accessibility checks creates barriers for users with disabilities

faq.question: What file formats does this skill output?
faq.answer: The primary output is a .pptx PowerPoint file. It also generates an accessibility-report.json with compliance metrics and documentation.md with generation details.

faq.question: Does the generated presentation include speaker notes?
faq.answer: Yes, speaker notes are automatically added based on the slide content and can be customized in the content structure.

faq.question: How is accessibility ensured?
faq.answer: The skill validates color contrast ratios (4.5:1 minimum), checks for alt text on images, verifies reading order, and generates an accessibility compliance report.

faq.question: Can I use custom templates?
faq.answer: Yes, you can define custom design systems with specific colors, fonts, layouts, and slide templates that will be applied consistently across all slides.

faq.question: What chart types are supported?
faq.answer: Common chart types including bar, line, pie, and scatter plots are supported through the pptxgenjs library.

faq.question: Is there a limit on slide count?
faq.answer: The skill supports 30+ slides. For optimal audience engagement, presentations with 40 or fewer slides are recommended.
